channel.title: Radio Three Sixty ACC
channel.itunes:subtitle: Radio Three Sixty: Music for Strange Moments
channel.itunes:author: DJ Darkhorse
channel.itunes:summary:
***IPOD, IPHONE AND HEADPHONE FRIENDLY. WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF RADIO THREE SIXTY. Music for Strange Moments*** RADIOHEAD, MASSIVE ATTACK, GUY BORRATO, BONOBO, BOYCHILD, STUMBLEINE, SUFJAN STEVENS, SHIGETO, GOYTE, KRUDER AND DORFMEISTER, MY BRIGHT DIAMOND, TENSEI, ESSAY, MUDVILLE, TOMMY GUERRERO, JAMIE T, MONEY MARK, MAN OR MOUSE, AIR, THE REFLECTING SKIN, DIPPER, SR MANDRIL, FINLEY QUAYLE, ALVIK, LITTLE DRAGON, COLDPLAY, BLACKMILL, ESSAY, DARKHORSE, THE CINEMATIC ORCHESTRA, FINK, BEAUTYS CONFUSION, VENTRILOQUIST, JIMMY THE FINGERS, YUKIJOBO, MOZEZ, DJ HARRY, THE ANGEL, ELLIOTT SMITH, CHLOE DAY, DAVID BYRNE, FICTION COMPANY, BEATS FOR BEGINNERS, MONEY MARK, MADITA, MARSMOBILE, THE BALDWIN BROTHERS, BITTER:SWEET, STEPHANE POMPOUGNAC, VENTRILOQUIST, MADRID DE LOS AUSTRIAS, SOFA SURFERS, M83, TOMMY GUERRERO, BROOKVILLE, HUSKY RESCUE, ALL INDIA RADIO, SEAN HAYES, FINK, ROY AYRES Vs DJ SPINNA, PAPERCUTZ, SUN GLITTERS, LOW, MEMORYHOUSE, UNDER, LANA DEL RAY, TRANQUILITY BASS, CHET FAKER, KJARTAN SVEINSSON, JAMES BERNARD, MOON HOLIDAY, APPARAT, FILM SCHOOL, FREDRIK, TYCHO, SPACE FLAKES, TELEFON TEL AVIV, BON IVER, NIGHTMARES ON WAX, ROYKSOPP, JUNIP, NAUGE, MIZIMO, AU REVIOR SIMONE, SCHOOL OF SEVEN BELLS, LUSINE, SINEWAVE, SONLUX, BOARDS OF CANADA, VIOLENT FEMMES, MODULE, KID GALAHAD, ZICO,TOAST BURGULAR, FAUXILAGE, SIGUR ROS, KJARTAN SVEINSSON, THE SIGHT BELOW, HELIOS, THE CONSULATE GENERAL, SKYTREE, LAL, LITTLE DRAGON, GROOVE ARMADA feat BRIAN FERRY, MARSMOBIL, ANDERSON, FISHBUNNY and many more
WHY?: Our aim is to expose you all to deep beautifully strange music that will help you in the every day, as you view the world around playing out like a silent color film, the music soundtrack in your ears. Your on your way to work on the subway or bus, waiting at an airport or just walking down the street, maybe your standing looking at the most inspiring view as you reach the top of Ankor Wat in Cambodia, as you watch the sun set over a tropical beach or ride around on a bike at Burning Man. There are those moments in life that you attach to music, that help you remember them many years later, we like to call it "Music For Strange Moments." If you like any of the songs you will see a link in the album art. The art is located bottom left of the itunes browser. This link if the song is available on itunes will take you to where you can buy the song. TELL YOUR FRIENDS ABOUT US...Please Support the Artists! ****** Read our blog about the show at: http://radiothreesixty.com ENJOY THE SHOW
